item.title: LISTEN: Eva Longoria on Investing in Soccer and Immersing in Mexican Football Culture With Her New FX Docuseries ‘Necaxa’
item.description: On the latest episode of the “Daily Variety” podcast, Eva Longoria joins co-editor Cynthia Littleton to talk about her new soccer docuseries, “Necaxa,” premiering on FX on Aug. 7. Before her involveme

item.title: ‘Necaxa’ Review: Eva Longoria’s FXX Mexican Soccer Docuseries Lives in the Shadow of ‘Welcome to Wrexham’
item.description: The Ryan Reynolds- and Rob Mac-produced project, which focuses on a struggling squad in Mexico, is one in a recent wave of series about celebrities investing in sports teams.
